body: I'm a meticulous planner so some things my editor and I butted heads hard on. Most changes I conceded to, but some things I just felt like "this needs to be here" and I made a case for it. I stand by the stuff I went to bat for even now.

guild.description:
Welcome to +Writing ! Discuss all things related to writing, share your work, and ask questions. 

Guild rules: 

- Please follow the global Ruqqus rules 
- Begone Bots 
- If you wouldn't say it to their face, don't say it on the internet. Criticism should be CONSTRUCTIVE. 
- You are welcome to share your work and self-promote. Just don't be a dildo and spam. 

Browse by new to get the full effect of the guild, trust me

title: What's something you disagreed with your editors on? Do you still feel the same way or do you think they were right in the end?

body:
What are you writing?

I don’t think anyone is ruqqus is into writing or inside of professional writing.

I’m assuming you write books rather than what I like to write.

body: Nah having a good editor is important. I do this for a living, and the people who say they need it the least are the ones who actually need it the most.
